author: Fiona Denton
description:
What Stalks the Dead sees T. Kingfisher return to her Sworn Soldier series for the third time. Although vastly improved by a knowledge of protagonist Alex Easton’s earlier adventures, this novella can also stand alone if you prefer. I’ve made no secret that Kingfisher is one of my favourite authors, and although I prefer her […]

title: REVIEW: What Stalks the Deep by T. Kingfisher
